TEXT.English: Hamstalfar Training Yards are dominated by huge exersize wheels. The city's entire population is expected to use the wheels regularly. This results in a particularly fit population, well demonstrating the benevolent leadership of the Hamstalfar Lords.
TEXT.French: Hamstalfar Training Yards are dominated by huge exersize wheels. The city's entire population is expected to use the wheels regularly. This results in a particularly fit population, well demonstrating the benevolent leadership of the Hamstalfar Lords.

TEXT.English: At the dawn of the Age of Ice, the once-mighty Alfar civilization fell victim to the forces of the nascent age, with a rivalry between the Summer and Winter courts erupting into violent civil war. This left many smaller settlements isolated and destined for deathâ€¦ Or so they thought. One particular settlement was destined for far greater things, however, and just when things looked the most dire, as ice choked the land and food became impossible to find, they were rescued by a rather unexpected group; A race of intelligent Hamsters. Now, much later, the hybrid "Hamstalfar" culture is well established. The Fuzzy Lords rule a much larger Elven population and own most property. Still, the relationship between the species is generally very good as the hamsters are gifted leaders. Elven culture tends to dominate outside the capital, though the "Kibblic Edda", an ancient cycle of hamster legend, is a common inspiration for most Hamstalfar artists.[PARAGRAPH:1]When commanded by Hamster officers Elven troops are among the finest in the world.

TEXT.English: The Hamster King is an elected monarch, the head of each Great House - the Fuzzy Lords - casting a vote. Valkrionn was elected unanimously and rules with absolute power. A master organizer, all the Hamsterhold is run with deft efficiency. Yet he is also both flexible and persuasive, guiding the Hamstalfar through great policy changes both quickly and without misstep.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said his gold eye possesses the power to see true motives of both rodent and elf.

TEXT.English: It is not unknown for a great hamster commander to take a gifted Elven warrior under his furry "wing." The wise rodent is carried into battle on the elf's strong shoulders, the pair leading the Hamstalfar armies from success to success.
TEXT.French: It is not unknown for a great hamster commander to take a gifted Elven warrior under his furry "wing." The wise rodent is carried into battle on the elf's strong shoulders, the pair leading the Hamstalfar armies from success to success.

TEXT.English: The Hamstalfar military is almost completely manned by the elves. Only one unit is made up entirely of Hamsters: The dread Hamstertruppen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Moving unseen into enemy territory, pillaging villages or consuming harvests, a swarm of highly-trained hamster warriors is an awesome sight.[PARAGRAPH:1]Without potent weapons the Hamstertruppen have difficulty in pitched battle. However, sufficiently well armed they are not just an awesome sight, but one few foe-men will see twice.

TEXT.English: Thanks to the Compact signed between the Alfar and their rodent overlords, their lands are prosperous, healthy, and well-defended.
TEXT.French: Thanks to the Compact signed between the Alfar and their rodent overlords, their lands are prosperous, healthy, and well-defended.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]May impress a Hamster Commander, fail, or even die
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]May impress a Hamster Commander, fail, or even die
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann einen Hamsterkommandanten beeindrucken, versagen und sogar sterben

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]May impress a Hamster Commander, fail, or even die

TEXT.English: A hawk piloted by a Hamster. Prior to the rescue of the Alfar, the Hamsters were vulnerable to assault by eagles; The Eagle Hunters were their first line of defense.
TEXT.French: A hawk piloted by a Hamster. Prior to the rescue of the Alfar, the Hamsters were vulnerable to assault by eagles; The Eagle Hunters were their first line of defense.

TEXT.English: Celvar is unbuildable. He must be summoned by a recon unit of at least level 6; The spell to do so becomes available after Animal Handling.
TEXT.French: Celvar is unbuildable. He must be summoned by a recon unit of at least level 6; The spell to do so becomes available after Animal Handling.

TEXT.Spanish: Celvar is unbuildable. He must be summoned by a recon unit of at least level 6; The spell to do so becomes available after Animal Handling.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Summons Celvar, an Eagle Hunter hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Celvar, unlike other Eagle Hunters, is free-roaming. However, he is leashed to his summoner; Choose wisely.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Summons Celvar, an Eagle Hunter hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Celvar, unlike other Eagle Hunters, is free-roaming. However, he is leashed to his summoner; Choose wisely.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Beschwört Celvar, einen Adlerjäger Held.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Celvar streift anders als andere Jäger frei herum. Er ist dennoch an seinen Beschwörer gebunden. Wählt diesen weise!
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Summons Celvar, an Eagle Hunter hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Celvar, unlike other Eagle Hunters, is free-roaming. However, he is leashed to his summoner; Choose wisely.
